error.message: The provided identity of type 'System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity' is marked IsAuthenticated = true but does not have a value for Name. By default, the anti-forgery system requires that all authenticated identities have a unique Name. If it is not possible to provide a unique Name for this identity, consider setting the static property AntiForgeryConfig.AdditionalDataProvider to an instance of a type that can provide some form of unique identifier for the current user.
error.detail: System.InvalidOperationException: The provided identity of type 'System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity' is marked IsAuthenticated = true but does not have a value for Name. By default, the anti-forgery system requires that all authenticated identities have a unique Name.
